name: vuex-rxjs
description: A type-safe Vuex alternative utilizing RxJS; Compatible with Vue Devtools
author: manuelsch

scripts.pre-publish: npm run build && (for %i in (vuex-rxjs*.tgz) do (del %i)) && npm pack && (if exist "./package" rmdir "./package" /s /q) && (for %i in (vuex-rxjs*.tgz) do (tar -xzf %i)) && (for %i in (vuex-rxjs*.tgz) do (del %i))
